meanings.definition: A venomous snake of the family Elapidae.
meanings.sent1: The elapid slithered silently through the grass.
meanings.sent2: I learned about the elapid in my science class.
meanings.sent3: The elapid decided to take a nap in the sun.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like the strike of an elapid, quick and deadly.
meanings.sent5: The elapid's fangs glistened with venom as it prepared to strike.

meanings.definition: Any member of the family Elapidae, including cobras and coral snakes.
meanings.sent1: We visited the zoo to see the elapid exhibit.
meanings.sent2: The elapid's colors were vibrant and beautiful.
meanings.sent3: The elapid family reunion was a hissing good time.
meanings.sent4: She moved with the grace of an elapid, swift and elegant.
meanings.sent5: The elapid's hood spread wide as a warning to its foes.
